oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Heroes; Men; Military uniforms; Medals
York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; World War, 1914-1918 -- Tennessee -- History
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sergeant Alvin C. York (1889-1964) in uniform.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Calvert
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Sergeant Alvin York (1889-1964) standing in his full service uniform from World War I. He wears four medals: a Tennessee medal, his Congressional Medal of Honor, the French Croix de Guerre, and what appears to be the Italian Croce di Guerra.
